LanguageData.TMSArtifactone.label: Apprentice's runestones
LanguageData.TMSArtifactone.description: It gives little power to animals. Do not use to Humans!
LanguageData.TMSArtifacttwo.label: Expert's runestones
LanguageData.TMSArtifacttwo.description: It gives power to animals. Do not use to Humans!
LanguageData.TMSArtifactthree.label: Master's runestones
